amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to maintaining the current law tax treatment of like kind exchanges.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6237; text: CR S6237) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to maintaining the current law tax treatment of like kind exchanges.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
